availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Residence: Ripley, Brown County, Ohio. An Ohio-born merchant. Enlisted in Company A, Ohio 70th Infantry Regiment, 18 Oct 1861. A Private. Mustered out 14 Aug 1865 at Little Rock, AR.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Ohio, Brown County, Ripley, p. 66.

Find A Grave, Entry for George Pittenger (1837-1920), Find A Grave Memorial # 10532406, Decatur Cemetery, Decatur, Brown County, Ohio, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=10532406 (accessed 30 June 2017).
Historical Data Systems, comp. U.S., Civil War Soldier Records and Profiles, 1861-1865 [database on-line]. Provo, UT, USA: Ancestry.com Operations Inc, 2009.
